description: Enterprise techniques used by TA459, ATT&CK group G0062 v1.0
name: TA459 (G0062)

techniques.comment: [TA459](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0062) has targeted victims using spearphishing emails with malicious Microsoft Word attachments.
[TA459](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0062) has exploited Microsoft Word vulnerability CVE-2017-0199 for execution.
[TA459](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0062) has attempted to get victims to open malicious Microsoft Word attachment sent via spearphishing.
[TA459](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0062) has used PowerShell for execution of a payload.
